title: Skill Scaffold Request v1
description: High-level request for creating a new MOVA skill scaffold.

new_skill_id.description: Stable identifier of the new skill, must start with 'skill.' (e.g. 'skill.repo_cleanup_basic').

new_skill_dir.description: Name of the subdirectory in skills/ for the new skill (e.g. 'repo_cleanup_basic').

title.description: Human-readable title of the new skill.

short_purpose.description: Short description of what the skill does (one paragraph).

skill_kind.description: Kind of skill to scaffold. 'llm_transform' = pure LLM transform skill (no external APIs). 'connector' = skill that wraps an external API/tool; in this case input_brief/output_brief/notes are expected to contain a pre-processed summary of the API docs (e.g. from skill.context7_docs).

input_brief.description: Textual description of what data the new skill should accept (in natural language).

output_brief.description: Textual description of what the new skill should return (in natural language).

include_case_example.description: Whether to generate an example case file.

include_doc_snippets.description: Whether to generate text snippets for docs/registry.

notes_for_prompt_profile.description: Additional preferences regarding the style/behavior of the new skill's prompt profile.
